titles.title: To improve the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes.
PRO Students Act
PRO Students Act
Protections and Regulation for Our Students Act
Protections and Regulation for Our Students Act
PRO Students Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Protections and Regulation for Our Students Act or the PRO Students Act
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to increase oversight of postsecondary educational institutions and provide consumer protections for students.
